title: Urbanization in Nigeria 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: In general Share of urban population in total population has rose over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Share of urban population in total population, of value 50.34 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 44.37 was reached at Year 2011
min_summary: Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
